page.title: 12POPULATION TRENDS,CAUNTON
page.content:
{ My family have lived in Caunton for {many years.My dad works on a local {farm,my mum works in the village.I was {born in Newark and I live in a farm {cottage.I have 9 aunts and uncles {who live in the village. { } { } My family have lived in Caunton for 3 years.Mummy works in Mansfield and Nottingham.Daddy works as an art inspector for the county. I have three aunts and uncles.None of them live in Nottinghamshire. I was born in Reading and now I live in an old house in the village. Before I came to Caunton I lived in Hampshire.
The majority of the families of school-age children have moved in from outside so their families are spread throughout the country.
